languages.text: The Cyber-Mastiff has its damage increased by {uip|WSBonusMoreHP|74e3f3003ec947e2a90bf493c9b3eb5d}% if its target has >50% Wounds -- and {uip|WSBonusLessHP|74e3f3003ec947e2a90bf493c9b3eb5d}% if the target has <50% Wounds.

traits.locale_text: The Cyber-Mastiff has its damage increased by {uip|WSBonusMoreHP|74e3f3003ec947e2a90bf493c9b3eb5d}% if its target has >50% Wounds -- and {uip|WSBonusLessHP|74e3f3003ec947e2a90bf493c9b3eb5d}% if the target has <50% Wounds.

languages.text: If the cyber-mastiff's target has more than 50% of its {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}, the cyber-mastiff's damage is increased by +{uip|WSBonusMoreHP|74e3f3003ec947e2a90bf493c9b3eb5d}%. If the target has less than 50% of its maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, the cyber-mastiff's damage is increased by +{uip|WSBonusLessHP|74e3f3003ec947e2a90bf493c9b3eb5d}%.
languages.original_text: Если у цели кибермастифа больше 50% от {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}максимального здоровья{/g}, урон кибермастифа увеличивается на {uip|WSBonusMoreHP|74e3f3003ec947e2a90bf493c9b3eb5d}%. Если меньше 50%, урон кибермастифа увеличивается на {uip|WSBonusLessHP|74e3f3003ec947e2a90bf493c9b3eb5d}%.

If the target has less than 50% of its maximum wounds, the cyber-mastiff's damage is increased by +{uip|WSBonusLessHP|74e3f3003ec947e2a90bf493c9b3eb5d}%.
